      • getCallHierearchy

        Linked<ProcessInstance> getCallHierearchy(java.lang.Long processInstanceId)
                                   throws ServiceException
        Returns the top-level linked process in the call chain for the specified instance. Downstream calls include all routes, whereas upstream calls include only the specific instance stack.
        Throws:
        ServiceException

      • getMilestones

        MilestonesList getMilestones(Query query)
                      throws ServiceException
        Returns milestone instances (not linked) for master processes that have milestones in their hierarchies.
        Throws:
        ServiceException

      • getMilestones

        Linked<Milestone> getMilestones(java.lang.String masterRequestId,
                                boolean future)
                         throws ServiceException
        Returns deep-linked milestones for a master process.
        Parameters:
        future - whether potential downstream milestones should be included
        Throws:
        ServiceException

        future - whether potential downstream milestones should be included
